snippet: The Justice Department appealed the Obama administration’s request for a stay of an order that the pill be available without a prescription for everyone.
abstract: Plan B One-Step morning-after contraceptive will not be sold over counter for all ages, at least through end of May 2013, after federal appeals court temporarily grants Obama administration request for stay of prior ruling that morning-after pill be available without prescription for all ages.
lead_paragraph: The Justice Department appealed the Obama administration’s request for a stay of an order that the pill be available without a prescription for everyone.

headline.main: Temporary Limit Put on Sales of Morning-After Pill
headline.print_headline: Temporary Limit Put On Sales of Morning-After Pill
